title: epiplots
text: epiplots inspired ggpubr. Like ggpubr aims make building publication ready ggplots easier faster, specific focus types plots used epidemiology. Think time series regression summaries. epiplots also includes variety geoms utility functions useful extras.

code: plot_epicurve(   df,   y = "cases",   x = "date",   color = "#2E4172",   date_breaks = "2 months",   date_limits = NULL,   y_limits = NULL,   y_breaks = 3,   y_range = NULL,   xlab = NULL,   ylab = NULL,   title = NULL,   subtitle = NULL,   caption = NULL,   ... )

title: Basic Epicurve — plot_epicurve
text: df dataframe / tibble / datatable Dataset. y chr Character string column plotted y axis. x chr Column name x axis data. Default 'date'. Warning: column must datetime formatted. color chr Bar color used. Default #2E4172 (dark blue). date_breaks chr Character string indicating time betweek x-axis ticks. Must expressed format '(#) (time unit)', example '1 week', '2 months'. Warning: parameter must lowercase; '1 Week', example, return error. Default '2 months'. date_limits date vct Axis limits used. Default NULL, allowing ggplot2::scale_x_date() set limits automatically. y_limits vct Vector two dbls indicating lower upper bounds y axis, eg: c(0, 2000). NULL, limits calculated automatically based data. Default NULL. NOTE: providing y_limits overide y_breaks. y_breaks int Number desired breaks y-axis; passed base::pretty(). Default 3. y_range dbl series Series used base::pretty() calculating y-axis breaks. xlab chr X-axis label. ylab chr Y-axis label. title chr Title. subtitle chr Subtitle. caption chr Caption. ... Parameters sent theme_basic, eg base_size.

title: Basic Epicurve — plot_epicurve
text: ggplot timeseries data.

title: Static Choropleth — plot_map
text: df dataframe / tibble / datatable Dataset. x chr Column name variable plotted choropleth. map sf optional simple features dataset containing GIS data join df using one default maps. x_range vector Min max value used setting color scale x. NULL, min max observed x used. Default NULL. date date Date plotted. NULL, recent available date used. Default NULL. factor_palette vector Named list colors (values) label names (keys) use color scale. option intended categorical variables present plot_map() ignore n_breaks color_palette. color_palette palette Color palette used. none provided, reversed version 'YlOrRd' RColorBrewer::brewer.pal() used. n_breaks int Number desired breaks x; passed base::pretty(). Default 5. na_color chr Color use shapes data. Default grey. border_color chr Color borders. Default white. border_size int Size borders. Default 0 (borders). percent bool Whether format legend labels percents. Default FALSE. si_notation bool Whether format legend labels limited si notation (k thousands, M millions). Default FALSE. keywidth int Width legend color bar. Note length whole bar, single segment. Default 70. label bool TRUE, id labels appear map. Default FALSE. label_column chr String indicating column name used labeling label TRUE. Default 'label'. label_size int Text size labels; ignored label FALSE. Default 3. title chr Title. subtitle chr Subtitle. caption chr Caption. legend_title chr Legend Title.
